attributes.action: Support our armed services by reinstating the Royal Tournament
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: What better way to demonstrate support for our military and their professionalism than to reinstate what used to be one of the best shows in town. A great family and school event.

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "Support our armed services by reinstating the Royal Tournament."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.number10.gov.uk/Page19053


Prime Minister's Office
